text: Hagi zamagra Tasisiti eri'za e'naza silvane, Ufaziti eri'za e'naza golinena eri'za golireti'ma keonke zama tro'ma nehaza vahe zamizage'za, ana havi anumzantamina eri anovazi zamante'naze. Ana hute'za kunavenke tavaravene koranke tavaravenena eri'za ana eri'zama antahini'ma hu'naza vahe zamizage'za zaza kukena hatitage'za ana havi anumzantamina antani nezamantaze.
